name: wifidrop
description: Local peer-to-peer file transfer via WIFI

scripts.removedir: node -e "var fs = require('fs'); try{process.argv.slice(1).map((fpath) => fs.rmdirSync(fpath, { recursive: true }))}catch(err){console.log(`Dist not found`)}; process.exit(0);"
scripts.gh-deploy-init: git push origin && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-deploy: git push origin :gh-pages && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
scripts.gh-old: npm run removedir dist && npm run build && git add dist -f && git commit -m "dist" && npm run gh-deploy && git reset --soft HEAD~ && git restore --staged .
scripts.gh: npm run removedir dist && git checkout --orphan temp_branch && npm run build && git add dist -f && git commit -m "dist" && npm run gh-deploy && git checkout main && git branch -D temp_branch
